column2: How [do/did] you usually buy [[CIGARFILL]s/ cigarillos/ filtered cigars] for yourself [when you smoke blunts]? Is it...
column9: Ask if current users and former user 12-month OR blunt-only cigar smokers
column10: For current smokers, display 'do' and [CIGARFILLs]; for 12-month former [CIGARFILL] smokers, display 'did' and [CIGARFILLs]; IF BLUNT_ONLY_GRILLO=1, display 'do', 'cigarillos', and 'when you smoke blunts'; IF BLUNT_ONLY_GFC=1, display 'do', 'filtered cigars', and 'when you smoke blunts'
column17: 1 = In person (such as at a store or cigar bar)
